channel.title: Work Experience on Hundter Biede's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Work Experience on Hundter Biede's Portfolio

item.title: Cashier
item.description: Interact with customers to ensure needs are met Clean store and maintain inventory

item.title: Clubhouse Attendant
item.description: Help the Clubhouse manager clean at the end of the day

item.title: Course Leader
item.description: Aided students with assignments and labs Graded programming assignments Managed a team of learning assistants

item.title: Intramural Flag Football Referee
item.description: Refereed Flag Football for University Greek, Co-ed, and Individual Flag Football games Intermediated disputes between players as well as between players and other refs Mentored new refs

item.title: Judges Coordinator
item.description: Contacted and arranged judges to assist with the State Leadership Conference Assisted with general conference preparation Aided in the updating/migration of State Foundation website and database

item.title: Maintenance Worker
item.description: Assisted in the maintenance and ongoing improvements to factory buildings

item.title: Scrum Master/Developer
item.description: Oversaw daily standups Designed systems to interact with large amounts of data using machine learning Performed code reviews on other developers’ work Established continuous integration systems Worked with corporate sponsors to determine project objectives

item.title: Senior Leader
item.description: Managed over 60 teaching assistants (TAs) for four introductory computer science courses, ensuring quality resources were available to all students to increase accuracy and efficiency in instruction. Compiled three technical interview prompts in Java and Matlab and provided feedback on materials written by coworkers in C and Python. Executed dozens of interviews and hired new TAs as a member of the hiring subcommittee. Presented workshops on debugging and pedagogy, impacting teaching strategies for hundreds of students.

item.title: Software Engineer
item.description: Architected complex reusable components for the shared design system to provide a consistent feel during advanced user interactions across the suite of four mobile applications. Administered thousands of code reviews, proposing algorithmic alternatives to improve app performance. Engineered two app modules in React Native to allow warehouse workers to quickly handle shipments. Spearheaded TypeScript conversion for multiple packages and apps. Conducted workshops on TypeScript, Git, and Testing for Accessibility to 50+ engineers in internal trainings.

item.title: Test Writer
item.description: Authored 10 objective tests for use at state and national competitions with thousands of participants. Overhauled task guidelines for 3 test events, giving guidance to future test writers and ensuring consistency in yearly performances. Served as an event judge for 9 performance events for both high school and college events.

item.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
item.description: Assisted in creating rating frameworks Assessed computer science instructors based on their teach efficacy

item.title: Youth Coordinator
item.description: Ensure the smooth execution of over 3,000 online testing sessions Review test question issues prompted by students
